comments:
When starting a build (with the plugin.xml listed below),
the following error is logged to the .log file:

java.lang.NullPointerException at
org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.internal.core.GeneratedMakefileBuilder.fullBuild(GeneratedMakefileBuilder.java:258)

This problem did not occur in CDT 1.2.1.
The plugin editor for both CDT 1.2.1 and CDT2.0M9 (tab plugin.xml) validates the
plugin with no errors (also with new schema taken from CDT2.0RC1 source code).

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<plugin
   id="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu"
   name="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider-name="AOS">

   <runtime>
   </runtime>
   <requires>
      <import plugin="org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.core"/>
   </requires>


   <extension
         id="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu"
         name="Fujitsu Tool Chain"
         point="org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.core.ManagedBuildInfo">
      <target
            cleanCommand="rm -f"
            osList="win32"
            name="Fujitsu PinPad"
            binaryParser="org.eclipse.cdt.core.PE"
            defaultExtension="out"
            makeCommand="make"
            id="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.target1">
         <configuration
               name="Release"
               id="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.configuration3">
         </configuration>
         <tool
               natureFilter="cnature"
               sources="c,C"
               name="Compiler"
               headerExtensions="h,H"
               outputFlag="-o"
               outputs="a"
               command="fcc911s.exe"
               id="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.tool1">
            <optionCategory
                  owner="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.tool1"
                  name="General"
                  id="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.tool1.general">
            </optionCategory>
            <option
                  name="Outputs start message"
                  category="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.tool1.general"
                  command="-V"
                  valueType="boolean"
                  id="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.tool1.general.option1">
            </option>
            <option
                  name="Outputs debug information"
                  category="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.tool1.general"
                  command="-g"

                  id="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.tool1.general.option2">
            </option>
            <option

               <enumeratedOptionValue

id="com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.tool1.general.option3.enumeratedOptionValue1">

PR was not targeted to any particular release. Changing target milestone to 2.1

The plugin.xml file contains an error.  The 
optionCategory "com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.tool1.language" contains 
the "owner" attribute with the 
value "com.aos.cdt.toolchain.fujitsu.optimize.tool1".  There is no tool or 
optionCategory with this id.  This is what causes the nullPointerException.  I 
am submitting a patch that checks for this failure, writes an error message to 
the console, and assigns the optionCategory owner to be the tool, so that 
processing of the toolChain can continue.
The patch has been submitted and applied.
